section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This subchapter may be cited as the “Removal and Disposition of Abandoned and other Unlawfully Parked Vehicles Reform Act of 2003.”

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see §§ 2 to 12, 14, 15, of Removal and Disposition of Abandoned and Other Unlawfully Parked Vehicles Reform Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-171, October 6, 2003, 50 DCR 9163).
